title: Solana Price Prediction: Analyst Calls for $2,700 SOL – But Only If This Crucial Level Holds
body: The Solana price has risen by 3% in the past 24 hours, with its move to $166 coming as Bitcoin reaches a new all-time high of $122,838 today. SOL is now up by 12% in the past week and by 16.5% in the last 30 days, while also posting a very healthy 104% increase in the past year. Yet with the market only just beginning to heat up again after several quiet months, some analysts are now predicting that Solana may be on course for a charge towards $2,000 and higher. This may be a best-case scenario, but with some of the best fundamentals in the market, the medium- and long-term Solana price prediction looks very optimistic right now. Solana Price Prediction: Analyst Calls for $2,700 SOL – But Only If This Crucial Level Holds Posting on X, analyst Ali Martinez suggested that, if the Solana price can pass and stay above $170 by the end of the week, it could break out towards $2,700. This optimism is based largely on SOL’s one-week chart forming a classic cup-and-handle pattern, which would imply a breakout if the alt can rise above the cup’s ceiling. This is a critical level for Solana $SOL . A weekly close above $170 could ignite the next major bull run and open the gates to $2,000! pic.twitter.com/JjTaRdUL4h — Ali (@ali_charts) July 12, 2025 The post above attracted some skeptical replies, yet the fact remains that Solana is still 43% below its all-time high of $293, so it certainly has some catching up to do. And given its fundamentals, there’s every chance that it could set new records later in the year, even if a surge towards $2,700 is perhaps a stretch. Indeed, not only is Solana the second-biggest layer-one blockchain in terms of TVL , but it’s looking forward to the possibility this year of spot-based SOL ETFs. Bloomberg analysts have given Solana ETFs a 95% chance of approval , and given that the SEC has previously accepted Ethereum ETFs, there seems to be no fundamental reason why they would refuse most SOL ETFs. As such, now is still a very good time to buy Solana, with the coin’s chart today showing a big surge in momentum, albeit one that’s still some way from becoming overbought. Source: TradingView Of particular note is the relative strength index (yellow), which has risen beyond 60 and is likely to reach 70 or 80 before SOL begins to correct. Likewise, the coin’s moving average convergence divergence (orange, blue) has also recently moved into a more bullish position, and is very far from overheating. We are therefore on track to see the Solana price pass $200 at some point in August, while it’s likely to reach $300 by Q4. Snorter Raises $1.8 Million in Presale: Is This the Meme Token with Fundamentals the Market Has Been Waiting For? If Solana is too much of a major token for some traders, they may want to investigate one of several promising presale coins available right now. Such coins can often generate so much momentum during their sales that they go on to rally big once they list, with Snorter (SNORT) being one likely candidate to do just this. Snorter opened its presale a few weeks ago and has already gone on to raise more than $1.8 million, a sign of its growing popularity. A automated sniping bot, Snorter will use AI to identify new coins before they rally, helping traders to improve their portfolios and returns. Users will need to hold native token SNORT to gain access to Snorter’s features, which also include copy trading, limit orders, atomic swaps, as well as protection from rugpulls. Snorter has already been busy growing its online community, with the token’s official X account now boasting over 13,000 followers . Its SNORT token will have a max supply of 500 million tokens, and it will run on Ethereum and also on Solana, giving it a wide reach. Holders will be able to stake it for a passive income, while newcomers can join its sale by going to the Snorter website . It’s currently selling for $0.0981, but this price will continue to rise for as long as the sale continues. The post Solana Price Prediction: Analyst Calls for $2,700 SOL – But Only If This Crucial Level Holds appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: FED, FDIC and OCC Issue Joint Statement on Cryptocurrencies
body: The three major federal banking regulators in the United States—the Federal Reserve, the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC), and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC)—have issued a joint statement outlining how existing rules will be implemented regarding banks offering cryptocurrency custody services on behalf of their customers. This statement aims to reduce uncertainty about how banks can participate in the crypto sector. In the joint statement, the regulators detailed how the existing legal framework and risk management principles would apply to crypto asset custody activities, while emphasizing that no new auditing standards were introduced. “Banking institutions considering crypto asset storage should take into account the evolving nature of these markets and the technology they are based on, and create an appropriate risk management framework,” it said. According to the statement, banks offering crypto asset custody services will be responsible for keeping digital assets secure on behalf of customers, and in this process, they will need to prioritize issues such as the protection of digital keys, cybersecurity risks, and operational controls. Related News: There is a New Development About Terra (LUNA) Founder Do Kwon - The Phrase “Productive Discussions” is Used for the First Time - Here are the Details The statement noted that storing crypto assets requires significant resources and expertise due to factors such as the complexity of the technology involved, market volatility, and rapid change. It added that banks must conduct comprehensive risk assessments and possess sufficient technical capacity before offering this service. Crypto assets can be held in both “fiduciary” and “non-fiduciary” capacities. Banks are required to comply with relevant federal regulations (e.g., 12 CFR 9 or 150) and state laws when acting as trustees, executors, or investment advisors. Since Donald Trump's re-inauguration, there has been a noticeable increase in statements and positions regarding crypto regulations. In May, the OCC announced that US banks could trade crypto assets on their own behalf. The FDIC, on the other hand, lifted the previously mandatory prior notification requirement, allowing banks to more freely participate in crypto activities. Following these regulatory announcements, the appointment of pro-crypto figures to the helm of critical institutions is also attracting attention. Last week, the Senate confirmed the appointment of former blockchain executive Jonathan Gould to head the OCC. Gould previously served as general counsel at Bitfury and held senior positions at the OCC. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: FED, FDIC and OCC Issue Joint Statement on Cryptocurrencies

title: Ondo Finance Revolutionizes RWA Future with Strangelove Labs Acquisition
body: BitcoinWorld Ondo Finance Revolutionizes RWA Future with Strangelove Labs Acquisition The world of decentralized finance (DeFi) is constantly evolving, and one of its most exciting frontiers is the tokenization of real-world assets (RWAs). Imagine bridging the gap between traditional finance and the blockchain, unlocking trillions in value. This vision just got a significant boost with a groundbreaking announcement: Ondo Finance , a leading player in the RWA space, has acquired Strangelove Labs. This strategic move isn’t just news; it’s a powerful signal that the future of finance is rapidly integrating tangible assets onto the blockchain. But what does this acquisition truly mean for the RWA ecosystem and the broader crypto landscape? What is Ondo Finance and Its Vision for Real-World Assets? Before diving into the acquisition’s impact, let’s understand the core mission of Ondo Finance . Founded with the aim of bringing institutional-grade financial products to the blockchain, Ondo has quickly established itself as a pioneer in the RWA sector. Their focus has been on offering tokenized versions of traditional assets, such as U.S. Treasuries and money market funds, making them accessible to a wider range of investors in a transparent and efficient manner. The concept of real-world assets refers to any tangible or intangible asset that exists outside the blockchain but can be represented on-chain through tokenization. This includes everything from real estate and commodities to private equity and even intellectual property. Ondo’s vision is to unlock the liquidity and programmability of these assets by putting them on a blockchain, thereby democratizing access to investment opportunities traditionally reserved for large institutions. They aim to solve key challenges: Accessibility: Breaking down barriers to entry for high-value assets. Liquidity: Enhancing the ease of buying and selling illiquid assets. Transparency: Leveraging blockchain’s immutable ledger for clear ownership and transaction records. Efficiency: Reducing intermediaries and streamlining processes. By focusing on regulated and compliant structures, Ondo Finance has built a reputation for bridging the gap between traditional finance and the decentralized world, laying the groundwork for a more inclusive financial system. Why is the Strangelove Labs Acquisition a Game-Changer for RWA Platform Development? The announcement that Ondo Finance has acquired Strangelove Labs sent ripples through the crypto community. But who exactly is Strangelove Labs, and what capabilities do they bring to the table that make this acquisition so significant for RWA platform development ? Strangelove Labs is renowned for its deep expertise in blockchain infrastructure, particularly within the Cosmos ecosystem. They are a team of highly skilled developers and engineers specializing in building robust, scalable, and secure blockchain solutions. Their work often involves core protocol development, interoperability solutions, and creating foundational layers for decentralized applications. Think of them as the architects and builders of the underlying digital highways and bridges that make complex blockchain operations possible. The synergy here is profound. Ondo Finance excels at the financial product layer – structuring and managing the tokenized assets. Strangelove Labs, on the other hand, provides the crucial infrastructure and technical prowess needed to scale these operations to an unprecedented level. This acquisition means Ondo can now control and optimize every layer of its RWA offering, from the underlying blockchain architecture to the user-facing investment products. This vertical integration is a massive advantage for: Accelerated Development: Faster iteration and deployment of new RWA products and features. Enhanced Scalability: Building out the capacity to handle a significantly larger volume of tokenized assets and transactions. Improved Security: Deepening control over the foundational layers to mitigate risks. Customization: Tailoring blockchain solutions precisely to the unique requirements of various RWA classes. This move transforms Ondo from a leading RWA product provider into a full-stack RWA powerhouse, capable of building and maintaining its own specialized infrastructure. It’s not just about adding features; it’s about fundamentally strengthening the backbone of their entire RWA platform development strategy. The Synergy: How This Blockchain Technology Merger Strengthens On-Chain RWAs The integration of Strangelove Labs into Ondo Finance represents a powerful consolidation of expertise in blockchain technology . This merger isn’t merely about expanding headcount; it’s about fusing specialized knowledge to create a more robust, efficient, and scalable system for bringing real-world assets on-chain. How does this synergy specifically strengthen the RWA ecosystem? At its core, the tokenization of RWAs relies heavily on sophisticated blockchain infrastructure. This includes everything from secure smart contracts and efficient transaction processing to robust oracle networks that feed off-chain data onto the blockchain. Strangelove Labs’ deep experience in Cosmos SDK and general blockchain architecture provides Ondo with: Core Protocol Expertise: The ability to fine-tune and optimize the underlying blockchain protocols for RWA-specific needs, such as compliance, privacy, and regulatory requirements. Interoperability Solutions: Expertise in bridging different blockchain networks, which is crucial for RWAs that might need to interact across various chains or with traditional financial systems. Enhanced Security Frameworks: Developing and implementing state-of-the-art security measures at the foundational level, crucial for handling high-value assets and maintaining investor trust. Scalability Solutions: Designing systems that can handle a massive influx of tokenized assets and transactions without compromising performance or increasing costs significantly. Consider the challenges faced by on-chain RWAs: regulatory hurdles, the need for reliable off-chain data, and ensuring legal enforceability of tokenized assets. While Ondo handles the legal and financial structuring, Strangelove Labs’ technical prowess in blockchain technology directly addresses the infrastructure demands for secure, compliant, and scalable operations. This combined strength means Ondo can not only tokenize more types of real-world assets but also do so with greater speed, security, and efficiency, setting a new standard for the industry. What Are the Benefits of This Acquisition for the Ondo Finance Ecosystem and Beyond? The acquisition of Strangelove Labs by Ondo Finance is poised to deliver significant benefits, not just for the company itself, but for its token holders, the broader DeFi community, and potentially even traditional finance. What can we expect to see as a result of this strategic move? 1. Enhanced Product Innovation and Speed to Market With an integrated team boasting full-stack capabilities, Ondo Finance can now accelerate the development and deployment of new RWA products. This means faster iteration on existing offerings and the ability to explore novel asset classes for tokenization. Imagine new types of real estate, private credit, or even carbon credits being brought on-chain with unprecedented speed and efficiency. This vertical integration reduces reliance on third-party developers for core infrastructure, streamlining the entire product lifecycle. 2. Increased Institutional Adoption Institutional investors demand robust, secure, and compliant infrastructure. By strengthening its underlying blockchain technology and RWA platform, Ondo Finance makes its offerings even more appealing to large financial institutions. The ability to control the entire tech stack from end-to-end provides a level of assurance and customization that is critical for attracting significant institutional capital into the RWA space. This could lead to a massive influx of liquidity and legitimacy for tokenized assets. 3. Greater Scalability and Market Penetration The technical expertise from Strangelove Labs will enable Ondo to handle a much larger volume of transactions and a wider array of real-world assets . This scalability is essential for Ondo to expand its global reach and cater to a growing demand for on-chain investment opportunities. As the market for tokenized assets expands, Ondo will be well-positioned to capture a larger share, becoming a dominant force in the sector. 4. Potential for ONDO Token Value Appreciation For ONDO token holders, this acquisition signals a strong commitment to long-term growth and market leadership. A more robust platform, increased adoption, and accelerated product development could lead to greater utility and demand for the ONDO token, potentially positively impacting its value. As the ecosystem expands and more value flows through the Ondo platform, the underlying token stands to benefit from increased network activity and potential revenue generation. 5. Setting a New Industry Standard This acquisition sets a precedent for how RWA platforms can evolve. By integrating deep infrastructure expertise with financial product innovation, Ondo Finance is pioneering a new model for full-stack RWA solutions. This could inspire other projects to follow suit, leading to a more mature and resilient RWA ecosystem overall, benefiting everyone involved in the pursuit of bringing real-world assets to the blockchain. The Road Ahead: Navigating Challenges and Opportunities in Real-World Assets While the acquisition of Strangelove Labs marks a significant leap forward for Ondo Finance and the broader RWA sector, the journey to fully integrate real-world assets into the blockchain isn’t without its challenges. However, it also opens up immense opportunities. Challenges to Overcome: Regulatory Landscape: The legal and regulatory frameworks for tokenized assets are still evolving globally. Navigating these complexities, ensuring compliance, and adapting to new regulations will be an ongoing effort. Liquidity Depth: While tokenization aims to increase liquidity, the initial stages for many new RWA classes might still face challenges in achieving deep market liquidity comparable to traditional markets. Oracle Reliance: Accurate and reliable data feeds (oracles) are crucial for pricing and managing tokenized RWAs, especially those with fluctuating values. Ensuring the integrity and decentralization of these feeds remains vital. Legal Enforceability: Ensuring that the on-chain representation of an asset holds legal standing in the real world is paramount. This requires robust legal frameworks and agreements. Opportunities on the Horizon: Democratization of Access: RWAs can open up investment opportunities in traditionally exclusive asset classes to a global retail and institutional audience, fostering financial inclusion. New Financial Primitives: Tokenized RWAs can serve as collateral in DeFi protocols, unlock fractional ownership, and enable innovative financial products that were previously impossible. Efficiency Gains: Reducing the friction, costs, and time associated with traditional asset transfers and ownership changes. Global Market Expansion: Blockchain’s borderless nature allows for easier cross-border transactions and investment in RWAs, opening up new markets. With the added technical muscle from Strangelove Labs , Ondo Finance is now better equipped to tackle these challenges head-on and capitalize on the burgeoning opportunities. Their enhanced RWA platform is poised to drive innovation, push the boundaries of what’s possible with blockchain technology , and accelerate the mainstream adoption of tokenized real-world assets . A New Era for Real-World Assets The acquisition of Strangelove Labs by Ondo Finance is more than just a corporate transaction; it’s a strategic declaration of intent. It signals a new era for real-world assets on the blockchain, one where the technical infrastructure is as robust and sophisticated as the financial products it underpins. By bringing together deep financial expertise with cutting-edge blockchain technology development, Ondo Finance is solidifying its position as a dominant force in the RWA space. This move promises to accelerate the mainstream adoption of tokenized assets, unlock unprecedented liquidity, and pave the way for a more integrated and efficient global financial system. The future of finance is increasingly looking like a seamless blend of the real and the digital, and Ondo Finance is now at the forefront of building that future, making its RWA platform a cornerstone of this exciting evolution. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping real-world assets institutional adoption. This post Ondo Finance Revolutionizes RWA Future with Strangelove Labs Acquisition first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Shiba Inu Price Prediction: Is SHIB Still a Money-Making Token? Experts Tip This Altcoin as a Better Buy
body: As Shiba Inu (SHIB) continues to trade sideways amid mixed investor sentiment, the spotlight is rapidly shifting to emerging DeFi protocols that offer more than just meme momentum. Among them, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is gaining traction in crypto circles, with analysts pointing to its innovative DeFi lending model as a potential game-changer in the altcoin market. Phase 5 Mutuum Finance presale recently surpassed 70% sold out at $0.03. This is the cheapest the token will be, with later stages set to feature higher prices. The presale has raised more than $12.3 million and onboarded more than 13200 unique holders. While SHIB struggles to reclaim past highs, Mutuum Finance has prompted experts to reevaluate what truly defines a “money-making token” in 2025. Shiba Inu Price Outlook At the moment Shiba Inu (SHIB) is trading at around $0.00001317 after failing to build on the recent gains above short term resistance of $0.00001380 which is consolidating. Although technical indicators might indicate a potential bounce of SHIB up to the level of $0.000015 during mid-July, the overall index of the cryptocurrency market and the decline of the hype with regard to memes-based tokens heavily affects the strategies of SHIB. The amount of trading and the social activity indicator have been dropping during the past weeks, which is an indication of a more cautious approach towards retail traders. This has made analysts wonder just how SHIB can continue being relevant in the altcoin market, given that attention has shifted towards tokens with more significant use cases in real life. Mutuum Finance simply became one such example that has begun to feature more and more in the discussions of experts and projects with a more practical purpose than driving the speculative need to move. Presale Phase 5 Nearing Sellout Amid Surging Demand Mutuum Finance is gaining traction during Phase 5 of the presale. The project stands out from other projects since it does not rely on hype but has actual use cases. Investor interest is growing with the project already going past more than $12.3 million and having over 13200 token holders. Growing Community and Rewards Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is offering a $100,000 giveaway , as a token of appreciation to the early supporters and in commemoration of the presale hype. Ten winners like these will receive $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens as a reward for being part of the early supporters of the project. With growing community at an exponential rate, the early supporters are rewarded, not only with the potential future gains, but with real, live rewards. With its unique leaderboard system the top 50 Mutuum Finance holders will get rewarded bonus tokens. Mutuum Finance to Launch New USD-Pegged Stablecoin Mutuum Finance is developing a fully collateralized USD-pegged stablecoin on the Ethereum blockchain. title: Perplexity's founder warns emerging founders that their breakthroughs are likely to be copied by Big tech companies
body: Aravind Srinivas, the founder of Perplexity, cautioned emerging founders that their breakthroughs are likely to be copied by Big Tech companies. While addressing attendees at YC’s AI Startup School, Srinivas spoke with a mixed audience of undergraduate, graduate, and Ph.D. students about the obstacles they might face in building AI products, as reported by Business Insider . He noted that once a startup gains traction, established players often roll out similar capabilities. At Perplexity’s debut, its chatbot had unrestricted web‑crawling, a feature that OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google have since added into their own offerings. Srinivas opened by stressing that founders must “work incredibly hard” to succeed, then observed it’s typical for deep‑pocketed firms to emulate any idea that shows promise. “If your company can bring in revenue in the hundreds of millions or even billions of dollars, assume a model company will copy it,” he said. He laid out why this happens. The biggest players often raise capital in the tens of billions, sometimes approaching $50 billion, and then hunt for new ways to monetize that investment. “They will copy anything that’s good. I think you have to live with that fear,” he added. Perplexity flags monopolistic tactics could cost users the “browser war III” Perplexity first launched as an “answer engine” delivering concise, web‑search–powered responses. When it went live in December 2022, most bots could only draw on their static training data. Three months later, Google’s Bard (now called Gemini) arrived with live internet queries, ChatGPT followed in May 2023, and Claude gained real‑time search in March 2025. Not long after, Perplexity’s head of communications, Jesse Dwyer, told that larger firms don’t just replicate your features but will “do everything they can to drown your voice.” On July 9, Perplexity rolled out its Comet browser, coinciding with a Reuters report that OpenAI is building a rival web browser. In a follow‑up, Dwyer argued that browser battles should favor consumers and warned that if users lose “Browser War III,” it’ll be because of monopolistic tactics from an “everything company.” He added that whatever OpenAI ships will be no different from Google’s approach. Srivinas’ warning also aligns with how Meta is aggressively bringing AI talent to the company to outbid rival companies, like OpenAI and Google, as part of its strategy to catch up in the rapidly evolving AI space. Last month, a report by CNBC said that Meta Platforms quietly approached Perplexity AI about a potential acquisition before moving forward with its $14.3 billion commitment to Scale AI. Those preliminary discussions never reached agreed financial terms, and Perplexity ultimately declined to pursue the offer. At the time, Perplexity had just closed a funding round valuing it at roughly $14 billion. Zuckerberg rolled out some of the most aggressive talent packages in tech history. As one of the “Magnificent Seven,” it’s dangling signing bonuses of up to $100 million to entice top AI experts away from competitors such as OpenAI. Reports also indicate Zuckerberg personally reached out to hundreds of engineers and researchers in recent months, contacting them directly via email and WhatsApp. KEY Difference Wire helps crypto brands break through and dominate headlines fast

title: Injective Protocol Unveils Revolutionary INJ Staked ETF Filing, Accelerating Web3 Finance
body: BitcoinWorld Injective Protocol Unveils Revolutionary INJ Staked ETF Filing, Accelerating Web3 Finance In the rapidly evolving world of digital assets, certain announcements stand out as pivotal moments. One such moment has just arrived from Injective, a leading Layer-1 blockchain at the forefront of Web3 finance innovation. The news? An official filing for an INJ Staked ETF , a development that signals a significant leap forward for institutional adoption and accessibility within the decentralized finance ecosystem. This isn’t just another headline; it’s a potential game-changer that could redefine how investors interact with yield-bearing crypto assets. What’s the Buzz Around the INJ Staked ETF Filing? Imagine being able to gain exposure to a high-performing cryptocurrency like INJ, while also benefiting from its native staking rewards, all within the familiar and regulated framework of an Exchange Traded Fund (ETF). That’s precisely what Injective Protocol is aiming to achieve with its recent filing. The project announced via its official X account that the process for its INJ Staked ETF is moving ‘faster than expected,’ a phrase that has ignited considerable excitement across the crypto community. For those new to the concept, a ‘staked ETF’ would essentially hold INJ tokens and actively stake them on the Injective network. This means the ETF would not only track the price of INJ but also accrue staking rewards, which could then be reinvested or distributed to ETF holders. This innovative structure offers a dual benefit: price appreciation potential combined with a yield generation mechanism, wrapped in a package that’s accessible through traditional brokerage accounts. It bridges the gap between the burgeoning world of decentralized finance and mainstream investment vehicles. Injective Protocol’s Vision for Decentralized Finance At its core, Injective is more than just a blockchain; it’s a powerful Layer-1 network specifically designed for building premier Web3 finance applications. From decentralized exchanges (DEXs) to prediction markets and lending protocols, Injective provides the infrastructure for a truly permissionless and transparent financial future. Its architecture supports blazing-fast transaction speeds, low fees, and cross-chain compatibility, making it a robust foundation for complex financial instruments. The filing of an INJ Staked ETF perfectly aligns with Injective Protocol’s overarching vision to accelerate the adoption of decentralized finance . By offering a regulated, accessible product, Injective is not just making it easier for retail investors to participate but also paving the way for larger institutional players to enter the INJ ecosystem with confidence. This move demonstrates a clear commitment to fostering a more inclusive and robust financial landscape built on blockchain technology. Why is This a Game-Changer for Web3 Finance? The implications of a successful INJ Staked ETF are profound, particularly for the growth and maturation of Web3 finance . Here’s why this development is drawing so much attention: Simplified Access: For many, directly purchasing and staking cryptocurrencies can be complex, involving self-custody, understanding staking mechanisms, and managing private keys. An ETF removes these barriers, allowing investors to gain exposure through familiar investment platforms. Yield Generation: Unlike traditional crypto ETFs that simply track price, a staked ETF offers the added benefit of yield from staking rewards. This makes the investment more attractive, potentially offering a more compelling risk-reward profile. Regulatory Clarity: The filing process itself signifies a step towards greater regulatory acceptance. A regulated ETF provides a legal and compliance-friendly avenue for institutions and traditional investors to allocate capital to digital assets, thereby enhancing the credibility of the entire sector. Enhanced Liquidity: Increased institutional interest and easier access can lead to greater liquidity for INJ, potentially reducing volatility and creating a more stable trading environment. Challenges and Considerations: While the benefits are clear, it’s important to acknowledge potential hurdles. The regulatory landscape for crypto ETFs, especially those involving staking, is still evolving. Approval timelines can be lengthy, and market volatility remains a factor. However, Injective’s proactive approach signals a readiness to navigate these complexities. The Broader Landscape of Crypto ETFs and Their Evolution The journey of crypto ETFs has been a long and winding one. We’ve seen the approval of Bitcoin spot ETFs and Ethereum futures ETFs, marking significant milestones in mainstream adoption. These products have provided a regulated gateway for investors who prefer not to directly hold cryptocurrencies but still want exposure to their price movements. However, staked ETFs represent the next frontier. They move beyond mere price tracking to incorporate the native yield generation capabilities of proof-of-stake blockchains. This innovation could set a precedent for other Layer-1 networks and dApps that rely on staking mechanisms for network security and tokenomics. If the INJ Staked ETF receives approval, it could catalyze a wave of similar filings, further integrating the yield-bearing aspects of digital assets into traditional financial products. Understanding Staking on Injective (Simplified) To grasp the full potential of an INJ Staked ETF, it helps to understand the underlying mechanism: staking. On the Injective network, INJ holders can ‘stake’ their tokens by delegating them to validators. These validators are responsible for securing the network by processing transactions and maintaining the blockchain. In return for their service, and for the INJ tokens staked with them, validators and their delegators earn rewards, typically in the form of newly minted INJ tokens and a portion of transaction fees. This process contributes to the network’s security and decentralization. A staked ETF would essentially perform this staking function on behalf of its investors, distributing the earned rewards, thus offering a passive yield opportunity without the complexities of direct staking. A visual representation of the Injective ecosystem’s integration with traditional finance. Actionable Insights and The Road Ahead For investors, the filing of the INJ Staked ETF presents a fascinating opportunity to gain exposure to Injective’s ecosystem in a potentially more diversified and regulated manner. It’s a signal to keep a close eye on regulatory developments and market sentiment surrounding such innovative financial products. For developers and projects within the decentralized finance space, Injective’s move serves as a powerful case study. It highlights the importance of building robust, institutional-grade infrastructure and exploring avenues for traditional finance integration. The future of Web3 finance is not just about building new applications but also about making them accessible and understandable to a broader audience. The ‘faster than expected’ pace mentioned by Injective suggests a strong commitment and potentially a streamlined process on their end, though regulatory approvals can always introduce delays. Nevertheless, this proactive step positions Injective at the vanguard of innovation in the crypto ETF landscape. Explore Injective’s vision for the future of staked assets and Web3 finance. Conclusion: A New Horizon for Crypto Investments The announcement of Injective’s INJ Staked ETF filing is more than just a news item; it’s a testament to the ongoing maturation and increasing sophistication of the cryptocurrency market. By seeking to blend the yield-generating power of staking with the regulatory comfort of an ETF, Injective Protocol is not only expanding access to its native token but also setting a new benchmark for how digital assets can be integrated into mainstream financial portfolios. This move promises to accelerate institutional adoption, bring greater liquidity to the ecosystem, and ultimately, help solidify Web3 finance as a formidable force in the global economy. The journey is just beginning, but the path towards a more inclusive and innovative financial future looks brighter than ever. To learn more about the latest crypto ETFs trends and their impact on the market, explore our article on key developments shaping the future of institutional crypto adoption. This post Injective Protocol Unveils Revolutionary INJ Staked ETF Filing, Accelerating Web3 Finance first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Delay In Bull Market Could Push Bitcoin Higher Than Expected
body: The bull market may be taking longer than expected to kick into its final gear, but the Bitcoin price structure remains bullish and steadily climbing within a rising trend channel. However, the potential upper targets have also moved higher, and might open the door to unprecedented price levels in the weeks ahead. Why The Bull Market Delay Might Be Good News Global uncertainties have delayed the second and possibly final phase of the current bull market in cryptocurrencies. According to master kenobi’s post on X, he noted that these delays may end up working in our favor. Related Reading: The Bitcoin Liquidity Supercycle Has Just Begun, Says Hedge Fund CEO While Bitcoin and altcoins have remained within the boundaries of an ascending trend channel, the upper and lower limits of this channel are steadily rising, and showing resilience in market structure despite the external hesitation. If the second phase of the bull market ignited in April, projections suggest that the BTC upper limit might have topped out between $134,000 and $155,000. However, as this didn’t happen, the upper limit has continued to climb, and if the 50-day pump pattern holds, the upper limit could be reached around August 11, at a range of $169,000 and $197,000. Naturally, this requires relative global stability. “Let’s hope for another 30 days of calm, as 20 days have already passed,” the analyst added. Why Bitcoin Surge Is A Market-Wide Trigger In an X post, Davie Satoshi also mentioned that Bitcoin is on the verge of something big, that BTC is hovering in the middle of a multi-year bullish channel. It has been marked by long-standing green trendlines, and has just broken through the resistance level, which is indicated by a blue dotted horizontal line that has capped upside momentum until now. Related Reading: Bitcoin To Reach $135,000 By September’s Close, Standard Chartered Forecasts Every time the Stoch Relative Strength Index (RSI) crosses over on the monthly chart, it leads to an explosive rally, and with the crossover freshly triggered, many see this as the start of something big and not just for Bitcoin. The analyst stated that a rising tide lifts all boats, and that Bitcoin has always been the bellwether of the crypto market. They also suggest that BTC price could surge toward $180,000 to $200,000, with a potential top forming around late August to September, which will be followed by alt season and peaking in Q4 2025 to Q1 2026. The memecoins and altcoins continue to dominate the narrative in the crypto space this year. The next NFT season two will begin in January 2026, followed by the Bitcoin Ordinals in mid-year 2026. “It’s always a cycle, and Not Financial Advice, so gamble responsibly,” he added. title: Cathie Wood Sells Off Shares of Coinbase, Robinhood and Others Before Diving Into This Big Tech Stock
body: Cathie Wood’s innovation-focused ARK Invest has sold off a large number of shares in several companies to load up on one Big Tech stock. Data from Cathiesark.com, which tracks the investment firm’s equity holdings and trades, shows that ARK Invest sold $6.3 million worth of top US crypto exchange Coinbase (COIN) on July 10th. The firm also sold $5.6 million worth of trading app giant Robinhood on July 10th and $8.5 million worth of streaming platform Roku (ROKU) between July 10th and July 11th. Other recent large ARK Invest sales include $1.8 million of electric aircraft maker Archer Aviation (ARCHR) on July 11th and $8.3 million in digital-payments company Square (XYC) between July 9th and July 10th. Amid the large sales, ARK Invest purchased a whopping $14.2 million worth of electric vehicle manufacturer Tesla (TSLA) on July 11th. ARK Invest’s top single holding is Coinbase at $881.4 million, while Tesla is in second at $865.1 million. Ark Invest’s third-largest holding is in Roku at $674.4 million, followed by Robinhood at $636.1 million. Ark CEO Cathie Wood said in a CNBC interview this month that the stock market is likely entering a strong bull run, while predicting a US economic recovery once the Fed cuts rates. “We have been climbing a wall of worry. A lot of people expected tariffs and wars and the controversy between the Fed and the President to really shake markets up. And of course, there has been some volatility. But these are the kinds of bull markets that I think are the most durable, when the market climbs through all of that controversy. It’s really signaling something. And I think the things that it’s signaling are: interest rates probably are coming down… we’ll move from a rolling recession into a recovery.” Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don't Miss a Beat – Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice.
